description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Help the monkey to get many bananas in this funny puzzle game. 4 levels with a different ammount and kinds of coins will keep you and your friends satisfied. And in the future there`s more to come!
